Name: Killer songs by bands you just discovered this year
Songs to listen to while looking out the window of a train
"Actually I prefer their newer stuff"
Description:
A band that actually... gets better with time! 
This one needs a good comment to set it up... something that contrasts the expected “I like their old stuff better.”

Name: Submit a song that would go on this HAPPY MIX!!
Description:
LOOK AT SLACK FOR A PICTURE!
From Jess: But not like what’s actually on it because I made it when I  was about 14 and it’s terrible.

Name: Dead But Forgotten
Description: singers/musicians who are no longer with us, but aren't in the pantheon of famous deads

Name: Whoa, the drummer is the singer?!?
Description:
The drums are incredible, complicated, impressive… and then you realize the main vocalist is the drummer!

Submit a track with impressive drumming where the primary vocalist, or at least a 50/50 split of vocals, is the drummer.

Name: submit your favorite song you’ve been introduced to through hard times music league and explain why
If you like X you should check out Y
Description: Introduce us to a lesser-known band/artist with reference to a more famous band/artist that they have similarities to

Name: What song would you pick to get out of jury duty?
Description:
Context: A co-worker recently told me they were given a questionnaire that included asking for their favorite song while awaiting jury selection.

Notes: GOOD SONGS ONLY. And no obvious songs. "Tiptoe Through the Tulips" is super banned.

Name: You probably haven't heard of them
Description: Artist must be under 3,565 monthly listeners.
